TopicTitle: How do you get custom flags?

Articles.Content: I was wondering how you get a custom flag instead of the presets they give you, is it a mod? or like some file thing?

Somebody invented this thing called a search bar..  where you talk to some guy named google...

 

Tutorial:Create custom flags!  Tutorial:Create custom flags! - Kerbal Space Program Wiki

The link above is fine and will walk you through the process.

 I found I didn't need to resize my flag, just dropped it in the folder. KSP resized it and made it the correct proportion on its own.

Best,

-Slashy
